msg: SQOOP-206. HBase import to use plugin InputFormat.

msg: SQOOP-202. sqoop-metastore should be able to handle missing pid files

author: abayer
msg: SQOOP-204. Allow connector specific bounds query.
This change introduces a new method in ConnManager that allows the
various implementations to optionally override it and specify
custom bounds query used for calculating splits during free form

msg: SQOOP-100. Sqoop to support populating Hive table partitions.
